page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A VICAR
page.content: Rev.Evans has been at St.Chads church for eight and a half years.Before this he worked at the Bank of England.He usually gets up by 6a.m. and tries to get to his desk at about 6.15a.m.The telephone doesn't usually ring before 7a.m. and the postman comes at about 7a.m.At 7.3Oa.m. he goes jogging and comes back for breakfast at 7.45a.m.From 9a.m. to 12p.p.m.he does preparation,planning and deals with callers.In the afternoon he visits hospitals and the old people.He eats by 6p.m.In the evening he has meetings,committees and tries to visit the people who he wanted to see in the afternoon.He finishes his working day by 10p.m.as he usually gets up early in the morning.
